TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Slovenia, title = Slovenia, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slovenia} }

S.FORM: Slovenia hya' ga cyux maki' tay 46 07 N, 14 49 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 20,273 sq km (maki' tay 155ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 20,151 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 122 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 1,978,029. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 22.80% , lhlahuy hya' ga 62.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 14.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Ljubljana. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 25 na tay mtzyu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Borut Pahor, aring ryax 22 squ byacing tay 12 sa kawas 2012 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Slovenia hya' ga cyox maki' tay 46 07 N, 14 49 E na Oco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 20,273 sq km (maki' tay 155ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 20,151 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 122 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 1,978,029. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 22.80% , lhlahoy hya' ga 62.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 14.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Ljobljana. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 25 na tay mtzyo' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Borot Pahor, aring ryax 22 sqo byacing tay 12 sa kawas 2012 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
